platform.hint: This platform provides a set of tools to manage your business and activities as a personal assistant professionally, and to deliver the best experience for your clients.
platform.header: Create a Basic Personal Assistant Account - (Free)
platform.title: Welcome to the Community of Inspirers at 'Tasami'
platform.description1: Your personal assistant account allows you to publish assistance programs and offer services to others. You can also create workgroups as virtual spaces for social learning, as well as activate your own channels to publish exclusive content and receive membership subscriptions within the 'Personal Assistant Community'!
platform.description2: By continuing, you commit that the assistance services you provide through the Tasami platform will not violate the regulations and laws in the country of operation, and you also commit to fulfilling all regulatory requirements determined by the relevant authorities whenever required.

subscription.upgradeYourPlan: Upgrade your plan to suit your business needs

subscription.groupsCount: Number of groups you can create
subscription.appCommission: Platform commission from contracts and memberships

myCommunity.message: The monthly deduction from members' accounts will be stopped while keeping the community active until all memberships expire, after which the deactivation will take effect.
